Emit a specific warning messages depending on HTTP status

Source: R/handle_http_status.R
handle_http_status.Rd

Status 401: Instruct how to authenticate. Status http_error: warn and show status.

handle_http_status(response, verbose = wastdr::get_wastdr_verbose())

Arguments

response

An HTTP response.

verbose

Whether to show debug messages. Default: wastdr::get_wastdr_verbose()

See also

Other api: build_auth(), download_minimal_wastd_turtledata(), download_wastd_sites(), download_wastd_turtledata(), download_wastd_users(), export_wastd_turtledata(), filter_wastd_turtledata_area(), filter_wastd_turtledata_seasons(), filter_wastd_turtledata(), wastd_GET(), wastd_POST(), wastd_bulk_post(), wastd_chunk_post(), wastd_create_update_skip(), wastd_parse(), wastd_post_one()
